AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payERC20(address,uint256,bytes).details: Pay with ERC20 token. Caller must approve this contract beforehand.

payNative(bytes).details: Pay with native token and attach optional metadata (ABI-encoded bytes)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).details: Emergency rescue for accidentally sent tokens (owner only)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawERC20(address,address,uint256).details: Owner withdraw ERC20 token balance to a receiver

withdrawNative(address,uint256).details: Owner withdraw native balance to a receiver
